<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. The tractor broke down, but JohnBoy didn't know how to fix it, but his younger brother Ben could.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason and Ben went to town to buy some candy at the brothers' favorite store.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason let JimBob and his other brothers play with his pet duck.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Jason took the dog hunting while his brother JohnBoy went fishing.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Thieves came to steal the horse, but brothers JohnBoy and JimBob were ready for them.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Ben and his brother JohnBoy saved the peacock from a mountain lion.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JohnBoy .

:JohnBoy a :Person ;
    :name "JohnBoy" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JimBob's peacock surpised Jason's visiting friends, but his brother explained that JimBob loved animals.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:JimBob a :Person ;
    :name "JimBob" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :Jason .

:Jason a :Person ;
    :name "Jason" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :brother :JimBob .</s>
